content: दूर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} ({%<ab>Compar.</ab>%}|दवीयस्|{%<ab>superl.</ab>%}|दविष्ठ) Distant, remote, far off, a long way off, long; किं दूरं व्यवसायिनां <ls>Chāṇ. 73</ls>; न योजनशतं दूरं वाह्यमानस्य तृष्णया <ls>H. 1. 146</ls>, <ls n="H. 1.">49.</ls> --रं Distance, remoteness. [{%<ab>N. B.</ab>%} Some of the oblique cases of दूर are used adverbially as follows:-- ({%a%}) दूरं {@--1@} to a distance, far away, far or distant from (with <ab>abl.</ab> or <ab>gen.</ab>); ग्रामात् or ग्रामस्य दूरं <ls>Sk.</ls> {@--2@} high above. {@--3@} deeply, far below. {@--4@} highly, in a high degree, very much; नेत्रे दूरमनंजने <ls>S. D.</ls> {@--5@} entirely, completely; निमग्नां दूरमंभसि <ls>Ks. 10. 29</ls>; दूरमुद्धूतपापाः <ls>Me. 55.</ls> ({%b%}) दूरेण {@--1@} far, from a distant place, from afar; खलः कापट्यदोषेण दूरेणैव विसृज्यते <ls>Bv. 1. 78.</ls> {@--2@} by far, in a high degree; दूरेण ह्यवरं कर्म बुद्धियोगाद्धनंजय <ls>Bg. 2. 49</ls>; <ls>R. 10. 30.</ls> <ab>v. l.</ab> ({%c%}) दूरात् {@--1@} from a distance, from afar; प्रक्षालनाद्धि पंकस्य दूरादस्पर्शनं वरं; दूरादागतः ‘come from afar’ (regarded as <ab>comp.</ab>); नदीयमभितो… दूरात्परित्यज्यतां <ls>Bh. 1. 81</ls>; <ls>R. 1. 61.</ls> {@--2@} in a remote degree. {@--3@} from a remote period. ({%d%}) दूरे far, far away, in a distant place; न मे दूरे किंचित्क्षणमपि न पार्श्वे रथजवात् <ls>Ś. 1. 9</ls>; भोः श्रोष्ठिन् शिरसि भयमतिदूरे तत्प्रतीकारः <ls>Mu. 1</ls>; <ls>Bh. 3. 88</ls>]. दूरीकृ means {@--1@} to remove to a distance, remove, take away; आश्रमे दूरीकृतश्रमे <ls>Dk. 5</ls>; <ls>Bv. 1. 122.</ls> {@--2@} to deprive (one) of, separate; <ls>Mk. 9. 4.</ls> {@--3@} to prevent, ward off. {@--4@} to surpass, excel, distance; <ls>Ś. 1. 17</ls>; so दूरीभू to be away or removed, be separated from, be at a distance; दूरीभूते मयि सहचरे चक्रवाकीमिवैकां <ls>Me. 83</ls>
